t: Amazon is selling its own private label diapers again, now under the Mama Bear brand | TechCrunch
s: November 9, 2017 - Today, Amazon Elements wipes have achieved 14 percent market share, up from 9 to 10 percent since last year, notes the firm One Click Retail. Another brand, Water Wipes, have gained more market share in wipes, but Amazon Elements is the number 2 gainer, the firm said.

t: Poop scoop! Amazon's private-label diapers are back
s: November 7, 2017 - The new diapers launched last week and are made by Kimberly Clark, according to a person familiar with the new products.
